price: He has made me blessed wherever I may be, and has enjoined upon me prayer and zakah as long as I am alive,
arabic: وَجَعَلَنِي مُبَارَكًا أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوۡصَٰنِي بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمۡتُ حَيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
